Class AbstractTask

    • nars.budget.BudgetedHandle

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, java.util.function.Supplier<Task>, Budgeted, BudgetedStruct, Task, Tasked, Temporal, Termed, Stamp, Truthed
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MutableTask

    public abstract class AbstractTask
extends Item<Task>
implements Task, Temporal
    Default Task implementation TODO move all mutable methods to MutableTask and call this ImmutableTask

      • equalStamp

        public final boolean equalStamp(@NotNull
                                Task s,
                                boolean evidentialSet,
                                boolean creationTime,
                                boolean occurrenceTime)
        Check if two stamps contains the same types of content

        NOTE: hashcode will include within it the creationTime & occurrenceTime, so if those are not to be compared then avoid comparing hash

        Parameters:
        s - The Stamp to be compared
        Returns:
        Whether the two have contain the same evidential base
